Uses of Package
com.linecorp.armeria.client

  • Packages that use com.linecorp.armeria.client 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client
    Client core.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker
    Provides a failure detection and fallback mechanism based of circuit breaker pattern.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.http
    Simple HTTP client.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.logging
    Logging and metric-collecting decorator clients.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.routing  
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.thrift
    Thrift client.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.tracing
    Provides distributed tracing decorators for armeria clients using Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.
  • Classes in com.linecorp.armeria.client used by com.linecorp.armeria.client 
    Class and Description
    AbstractClientFactory 
    Client 
    ClientBuilder
    Creates a new client that connects to the specified URI using the builder pattern.
    ClientDecoration 
    ClientDecorationBuilder 
    ClientFactory
    Creates and manages clients.
    ClientOption
    A client option.
    ClientOptionDerivable 
    ClientOptions
    A set of ClientOptions and their respective values.
    ClientOptionValue
    A value of a ClientOption.
    ClientRequestContext
    Provides information about an invocation and related utilities.
    Endpoint 
    ResponseTimeoutException
    A TimeoutException raised when a response has not been received from a server within timeout.
    SessionOption
    An option that affects the session management of a ClientFactory.
    SessionOptions
    A set of SessionOptions and their respective values.
    SessionOptionValue
    A value of a SessionOption.
    WriteTimeoutException
    A TimeoutException raised when a client failed to send a request to the wire within timeout.
